_sText:
THIS IS THE FINAL VERSION KEKW

We have addressed some of the complaints people had and fixed it.

The map has been made easier. It’s no longer tier 9, but more like 7.

 

-          Fixed ability to CP, triggers to function like in Kyoto. A lot more  CP friendly

-          Added a ladder at the end of stage 1 for Expert Zone, where ground boost doesn’t function properly.

-          Removed the 4th last stage ( x2 x2 x2 x2 to bhop )

-          Removed the long RB in the final stage.

-          Made the 3rd last valpect stage easier

-          2nd last stage start (layered surf) made easier

-          Final stage : Removed the booster bhops and x1 that follows after that, near the end in space. No more RNG involved and a lot easier. It’s now x1 straight to the end
